After joining the spider-tattooed army against their will, Lupin and his gang make both new friends and enemies as they not only plan to take home the Tarantulas’ massive gold repository for themselves, but hunt down the shooter from Lupin’s past. Punk Unchained","original_title":"Daft Punk Unchained","overview":"Daft Punk Unchained is the first film about the pop culture phenomenon that is Daft Punk, the duo with 12 million albums sold worldwide and seven Grammy Awards. Throughout their career Thomas Bangalter and Guy-Manuel de Homem-Christo have always resisted compromise and the established codes of show business. They have remained determined to maintain control of every link in the chain of their creative process. In the era of globalisation and social networks, they rarely speak in public and neither do they show their faces on TV.  This documentary explores this unprecedented cultural revolution revealing a duo of artists on a permanent quest for creativity, independence and freedom.","poster_path":"/cZhguyhaCAcRCSEn1QUHPCDSKzk.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[10402,99],"popularity":9.898,"release_date":"2015-06-24","video":false,"vote_average":7.201,"vote_count":142},{"backdrop_path":"/lHadWN9AM8EovBAGsH73rOpY4q0.jpg","id":101287,"title":"The Three Garcías","original_title":"Los tres García","overview":"Ruled by a tough grandma, the Garcías are three charro cousins who fall in love with young American-born Lupita and fight for her love until grandma quiets them.","poster_path":"/AavXCrNGRZmA77jyecxHa9hvJI4.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[35,10749],"popularity":11.784,"release_date":"1947-08-15","video":false,"vote_average":7.8,"vote_count":69},{"backdrop_path":"/mIR2xM16XDa1ynU2XXeGAYZ8BgA.jpg","id":16220,"title":"Wizards","original_title":"Wizards","overview":"After the death of his mother, the evil mutant wizard Blackwolf discovers some long-lost military technologies.
